message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $11,500. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point, considering its worth. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,800 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,100? It's a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go a bit lower to $10,500?
